QuestData.Title: Is This Thing On?
QuestData.Description: <The Gnomecorder crackles with energy. You can hear Lieutenant Paulson on the other end.>$B$BStupid gnome junk... Is ANYBODY there? $n, are you there?$B$BMaybe $g he's:she's; dead.$B$BListen, if you can still hear me, we just got word that a Horde master assassin is in the mines, directing the other assassins. Find her, kill her, report back to me.$B$BPaulson, out.
QuestData.RewardText: Nicely done, $n! You worked the mines like a pro. Now how about returning my goggles.
